meanings.definition: A six-membered heterocyclic compound containing one oxygen atom and five carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of the pyran under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The pyran is commonly found in various natural products.
meanings.sent3: The pyran molecule decided to throw a party for all its carbon and oxygen friends.
meanings.sent4: The pyran floated through the chemical reaction like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The unique shape of the pyran makes it easy to identify in organic chemistry.

meanings.definition: A class of compounds derived from pyran.
meanings.sent1: Many pharmaceuticals are based on the properties of pyran.
meanings.sent2: Chemists have been exploring the potential of pyran derivatives for new drugs.
meanings.sent3: The pyran family reunion was a gathering of diverse and interesting compounds.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas branched out from the main concept like pyran derivatives in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The versatility of pyran compounds opens up a world of possibilities in chemistry.
